secondary_intents.name: Greetings
secondary_intents.description: When a customer gives greetings only like Hi, hello, thank you etc.

secondary_intents.name: Acknowledgment
secondary_intents.description: When a customer gives acknowledgment only like Ok, Thanks, Got it, Alright etc.

secondary_intents.name: Out of Scope
secondary_intents.description: (NEW) The cluster includes messages that are unsolicited social expressions ('I love you') and unintelligible inputs ('Boio'), which are not covered by any existing functional or basic interaction intents. This necessitates a new intent for handling non-query, conversational, or unclassifiable inputs that fall outside the defined categories.

secondary_intents.name: Contact Details
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks about the company's contact specifically.

secondary_intents.name: About Team
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks about the team.

secondary_intents.name: Unsure About Effectiveness
secondary_intents.description: When the customer is not sure about the effectiveness of the product.

secondary_intents.name: Product Ingredients
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks about the ingredients of a product.

secondary_intents.name: Pricing
secondary_intents.description: When the message is related to the price of a product.

secondary_intents.name: No More Product Query
secondary_intents.description: When the customer's message indicates they have no further questions about the product.

secondary_intents.name: All Products
secondary_intents.description: When the message is related to all products that company provides.

secondary_intents.name: Payment Options Available
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about payment options available.

secondary_intents.name: Certification
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks for product certification or if it is harmful chemical free.

secondary_intents.name: Place Order
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks how to place an order.

secondary_intents.name: Comparison
secondary_intents.description: When the message is related to comparing one product with another product.

secondary_intents.name: Out of Stock
secondary_intents.description: When customer says product is out of stock or can't find it on website.

secondary_intents.name: Product Info
secondary_intents.description: When the customer wants to know how to use etc or says yes to a question about how to use by the agent.

secondary_intents.name: Product Specialty
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks specialty or benefits of a product or says yes to a question about specialty prompted by the agent.

secondary_intents.name: Product Safety
secondary_intents.description: (NEW) Several messages explicitly ask about product safety and potential side effects, particularly for a child (e.g., 'Age 10 year h koi side effects', 'Ye product safe to h'). This concern is not adequately captured by existing intents like 'About Product > Certification', which focuses on chemical-free status and formal certifications, not general safety or specific adverse reactions.

secondary_intents.name: Customer Problem
secondary_intents.description: When the customer talks about a personal issue, concern, or challenge they are facing (which could be related to the product but doesn't involve expressing dissatisfaction or frustration).

secondary_intents.name: Customer Concern Related Information
secondary_intents.description: When the customer shares their details like concern etc for product recommendation.

secondary_intents.name: Seeking Solution
secondary_intents.description: When customer asks recommendation for a product/category for their skin/hair type.

secondary_intents.name: Address Change
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about changing the address of the order.

secondary_intents.name: Wrong/Damaged Order
secondary_intents.description: When the customer mentions that they received a wrong order/incorrect order or damaged order or missing product or the customer wants to exchange the product.

secondary_intents.name: Marked Delivered, Not Received
secondary_intents.description: Only applicable when the customer reports that the tracking/portal shows their order as 'delivered,' but they have not actually received the package.

secondary_intents.name: B2B Queries
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about B2B queries like placing bulk order or talks about distribution.

secondary_intents.name: Refund Policy
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks for the status of their refund/or when they will get their refund amount.

secondary_intents.name: Refund Required
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asking you to give refund or asking about refund policy.

secondary_intents.name: Cancellation
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about the cancellation policy for any product.

secondary_intents.name: Payment Related Issues
secondary_intents.description: When the customer talks about payment is failed but their money is deducted, or they are having trouble with payment.

secondary_intents.name: E-commerce/Quick Commerce
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about the availability of the product on e-commerce platforms.

secondary_intents.name: Feedback
secondary_intents.description: When the customer is complaining or giving feedback about a product/service or delivery.

secondary_intents.name: Order Status
secondary_intents.description: When the customer talks about the status of an order, or asks for order tracking, or delay in delivery.

secondary_intents.name: Discount
secondary_intents.description: When the customer asks about offers or discounts available for a product.

secondary_intents.name: Talk to Agent
secondary_intents.description: When the customer is explicitly asking to wants to connect with a live agent or want to talk to a human.

secondary_intents.name: Return Policy
secondary_intents.description: When a customer asks for the return policy for any product.

secondary_intents.name: Complaint
secondary_intents.description: When the customer expresses a complaint, concern, dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment regarding a skincare product or service—including mentions of the product not working, being ineffective, causing irritation, having poor results, or not meeting their expectations. Damaged order and wrong order received is not considered as complaint.

secondary_intents.name: Website Issue
secondary_intents.description: When the customer reports any issue related to the website, such as errors, loading problems, or when they are unable to place an order.

secondary_intents.name: Order Not Received
secondary_intents.description: (SPLIT) This cluster predominantly features customers reporting that they have not received their order, indicating a critical delivery failure beyond a simple status check or minor delay. While 'Order Status' covers delays, the emphasis here is on non-receipt as a problem, warranting a specific intent for these more severe delivery issues.
